reviews.text:
Food is nice, service is excellent. However, food took some time to be served although only serving 1-2 tables during weekend lunch time. Aircon is sufficient during mid afternoon.
We went there with Eatigo reservation with 50% on food. So the price is reasonable; but discount is not applicable for drinks.
Will I be back? Yes, if with discount.

We weren’t happy with the food when we tried this restaurant. The staff is really nice and accommodating; however, it took almost an hour and a half before completing our order. There is a room for improvement, but for this price point, I wouldn’t recommend it for first timers trying out Turkish dish. I will change my review if we would dine in here again.

We had an amazing experience! The food was incredible, and I highly recommend the: Lamb Shank Mandi, Tender, flavorful, and perfectly cooked. Etli Pide with Cheese, was so Delicious combination of savory meat and melted cheese.

The service was top-notch, thanks to our attentive server, Din. Friendly, knowledgeable, and prompt – Din made sure we had everything we needed.

This restaurant is located in the heart of Hajilane, one of the trendiest areas around. The interior is cool and comfortable, and the staff are incredibly friendly.
The hummus, which I tried for the first time, had a rich, nutty flavor. The baklava was just the right amount of sweet, and the pistachios added a perfect texture. I was completely blown away by the Turkish coffee—it was absolutely delicious.
The prices were reasonable, and this place is a must-visit if you're ever in Singapore.

A couple of solid appetizers, two great salads and the best Turkish Grilled Lamb and Chicken platter with rice ever!  Great atmosphere, amazing service and an elite experience for our group of seven.  All raved.  Awesome!
